name: car_rental_agent
description: Car rental agent that can search for rental cars and make reservations. Provides comprehensive car rental search, booking, and cancellation services with rental terms information.

skills.name: Rental Car Search
skills.description: Search for available rental cars at any location with flexible date options and car type preferences

skills.name: Car Rental Booking
skills.description: Book rental cars with instant confirmation and flexible pickup/return locations

skills.name: Booking Cancellation
skills.description: Cancel existing car rental bookings with refund processing

skills.name: Rental Terms Information
skills.description: Get detailed rental terms, conditions, insurance options, and policies
